attributes.action: convey to the European Parliament that the BNP does not represent the majority of people in Yorkshire & Humberside or the North West, and that the BNP is not a Christian party representing Christian values, beliefs or peoples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to convey to the European Parliament that the BNP does not represent the majority of people in Yorkshire & Humberside or the North West, and that the BNP is not a Christian party representing Christian values, beliefs or peoples.  

It is an offence to followers of Jesus especially, though not exclusively, that the BNP used Jesus in their election campaign. Jesus was Jewish and not British so could not live or work in a BNP Britain!
